name: List
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink
List
description: Sink::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: next?
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of sinks.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging

sinks = logging.sinks
if sinks.next?
  next_sinks = sinks.next
end

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging

sinks = dataset.sinks
if sinks.next?
  next_sinks = sinks.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all sinks by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each sink, which is passed as the parameter.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method may make several API calls until all sinks are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each sink by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
sinks = logging.sinks

sinks.all do |sink|
  puts "#{sink.name}: #{sink.filter} -> #{sink.destination}"
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
sinks = logging.sinks

all_names = sinks.all.map do |sink|
  sink.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
sinks = logging.sinks

sinks.all(request_limit: 10) do |sink|
  puts "#{sink.name}: #{sink.filter} -> #{sink.destination}"
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to make
to load all sinks. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each sink.
